title: 3rd Place - Data Science Hackathon 2023
description: Secured 3rd place in a one-day data science hackathon organized by Brainovision Solutions India Pvt. Ltd. during 2022-2023. My team developed an innovative solution using Python, enhancing my skills in collaboration, problem-solving, and data analysis.
